description:

今日主持人：jamesryan457

20秒音频：

小编模仿音频： 

模仿文本： Flying at altitudes of about 7,000 meters, the photo-reconnaissance aircraft captured detailed images of mountain snowpack over a wide area.
The NASA flight will also measure how much sun is reflected from the snowpack, which can indicate how fast it is likely to melt.飞行在海拔约7000米的高度，空中拍照观测机捕捉了覆盖大范围雪山积雪的精密图像。
美国国家航空航天局还测量多少阳光遇积雪反射回来，这能预示积雪可能多快融化。

title: 全球变暖 供水危机(3/3)

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

背景介绍：

接连发生的事故让人心神不禁为之一颤。他们本该享受着父母宠爱，快乐成长，无忧无路的孩子们居然面临着各种威胁。他们看到了本应该被大人们遮挡住的那片黑暗。这让我们痛心，更值得我们反思。
都说儿童意味着未来，这些灿烂的笑容里不应该藏着阴霾。
我们应该做什么，我们能做什么？

话题：

What can we do to protect our children?

范例1：

   In view of those news, I think there are a punch of deficiencies we need to fix up. First and the most important, parents need to teach their little children to protect themselves and to call out for help if there is anything uncomfortable happened to them, at the same time, parents can talk with the children about the daily things happening at school in order to know more about their school lives. Secondly, the Education bureaus have to make rigorous investigation to each teacher to make sure their quality for being a teacher. Thirdly, the government must put the bill of protecting children into their schedule to provide a pure environment for them to grow up.

范例2：

   It is hard to protect the purity of children coming up with the fickle filthy atmosphere, which means the society is inundated with negative news like homosexual, rape, bomber, gun, and so on. If children grow up in such situation, their hearts is just loaded with hatred rather than happiness. However, the way to protect their heart of gold is not as difficult as we imagine, which is just to change ourselves no matter from behavior or from words and that can set the pattern for children because the youth is apt at mimicking from outside. In one word parents are the first teacher to children and if parents cannot be cultivated with positive energy, let alone hope them to foster a responsible child.

范例3：

   It has been reported that a teacher who committed several sexual assaults on children was sentenced to death. What worries me more is that lots of similar incidents haven’t been reported yet in China. And most of the criminals do not receive the punishment they deserve, but only get a so-called ‘disciplinary punishment within the party’. In order to keep our children from sexual assaults, a perfect legal system should be set up. Any settlement in private should not be allowed, such as expulsion from the party or being relived from their positions or simply some money for compensation. To conclude, only when there is a fair trial can our children be legally protected.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>

description:
还在羡慕BBC播音员员一口地道标准的英式发音吗？想要练就纯正英音，《BBC英音模仿秀》帮你忙！《BBC英音模仿秀》是一档沪江部落的原创口语互动节目，主持人对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：Mornight

25秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

The British pharmaceutical giant GlaxoSmithKline has admitted that some of its top Chinese executives broke the law in what the Chinese authorities claim is a half-a-billion-dollar bribery scandal. The company is alleged to have paid doctors and lawyers cash and sexual favours to boost sales and market share in the country. Our correspondent Martin Patience is in Beijing.英国制药巨头葛兰素史克已经承认它在中国的一些高管陷入了中国政府声称的高达5亿美元的贿赂丑闻等违法行为。该公司被指控向医生和律师提供现金和性贿赂以提升其在中国的销售和市场份额。我们的记者马丁·佩申斯就在北京。

语调示意图：

重点单词发音讲解：
pharmaceutical [,fɑːmə'suːtɪk(ə)l; -'sjuː-]
bribery ['braɪbərɪ]

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

歌手介绍：

Groove Coverage舞动精灵

是德国新晋乐队，以其混合多种元素的舞曲风格迅速走红，驰名全欧。god is a girl（上帝是个女孩）就是Groove Coverage的作品之一。

乐队成员

主唱：Mell (2000-2001,2004-至今)
1981年4月8号出生（后来MELL怀孕,期间乐队找到了18岁 的Verena代替）
Lenka 　(2001-2002)
不知道什么原因很快离开了乐队，她只演唱了Moonlight Shadow 的MTV版和LIVE版就离开了乐队
Verena （2002-2004）
1984年5月14日出生纽博格.巴伐利亚。 2004年之后，Mell休产假归来复出，继续做乐队组合主唱 至今。后来 Verena在后台参加创作，其实Verena并没有离开。
DJ：Novus
原名Markus Schaffarzyk。1976年11月7日出生，负责DJ及创作

成就

德国柏林举办的一年一度的"2003年德国舞曲大赏Deutchscher Dance Award","舞动精灵乐团 Groove Coverage"以新人之姿荣获提名入围多项奖项，最终获得评审团青睐，夺得"

年度最佳舞曲团体"奖项!
德国柏林举办的一年一度的"2003年德国舞曲大赛中，"舞动精灵乐团 Groove Coverage"以新人之姿荣获提名入围多项奖项：Best Dance Act National（年度最佳舞曲团体）、 Best Dance Hit （年度最佳舞曲）和Best Newcomer（最佳新进艺人）。
许多歌迷喜欢groove coverage的原因是他们虽然都是德国籍艺人，但是却坚持使用英文创作和演绎，并且不断努力致力于做出更加国际化的音乐以奉献给全球歌迷！  

歌曲信息

she——Groove Coverage

模唱片段：

She hangs out every day near by the beach

Havin’ a HEINEKEN fallin’ asleep

She looks so sexy when she’s walking the sand

Nobody ever put a ring on her hand

Swim to the oceanshore fish in the sea

She is the story the story is she

She sings to the moon and the stars in the sky

Shining from high above you shouldn’t ask why

She is the one that you never forget

She is the heaven-sent angel you met

Oh, she must be the reason why God made a girl

She is so pretty all over the world

音频讲解：

title: 英乐天天唱: She

description:
《美剧天坛秀》节目是沪江部落一档模仿类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语水平，在轻松看美剧的同时锻炼大家的口语能力。积极参与的童鞋还会得到主持的专业点评哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

原录音：

原文：There is a widely read book that tells us everyone is a sinner. Of course, not everyone who reads this book feels guilt over the bad things that they do. But Bree Van de Kamp did. In fact, Bree had spent most of her life, feeling guilty. As a child, she felt guilty about not getting straight A's. As a teenager, she felt guilty about letting her boyfriend go to second base. As a newlywed, she felt guilty about taking three weeks to get out her thank you cards.

重点单词发音讲解：

widely
英[ˈwaɪdlɪ] 美[waɪdli]
adv. 广泛地；普遍地
 
sinner
英['sinə] 美['sinə]
n. 罪人,不知礼仪的人,无赖
 
newlywed
英['nju:liwed] 美['nju:liwed]
n. 新婚的人，新婚夫妇
